entry.title: COPA 2025
entry.content:
Two of our papers received top honors this year at the 14th Symposium on Conformal and Probabilistic Prediction with Applications (COPA).

Best Paper: Conformal Survival Bands for Risk Screening under Right-Censoring, with Vladimir Svetnik.

Best Poster (one of two awards): Conformal Classification with New Labels, with my PhD student Tianmin Xie, Ziyi Liang, and Stefano Favaro.
entry.summary: Our team received both the best paper award and the best poster awards at COPA 2025.

entry.title: Google Research Scholar Award
entry.content: My research proposal on conformal inference for uncertainty estimation in real-world machine learning has been generously selected for funding by Google Research. Thank you!
entry.summary: Received a Google Research Scholar award.

entry.title: ICML 2025
entry.content:
My collaborators and I had two papers accepted to the International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML) this year, one of which was selected as a spotlight (top 2.6% of submissions).

The poster paper, with Meshi Bashari and Yaniv Romano, introduces a robust conformal outlier detection method that can work with contaminated reference data, using an active data-cleaning strategy. Read more

The spotlight paper, with Vladimir Svetnik, presents a doubly robust conformal method for survival analysis with right-censored data, offering reliable inferences even when survival models are misspecified. Read more
entry.summary: Two papers accepted at ICML 2025, of which one spotlighted (top 2.6% of submissions).
